## Insights Staff App v1.2.1

- Scanner UI simplified with top-left back button and top-right torch toggle.
- Staff attendance scanning supports continuous scans with in-scanner success/error feedback.
- Attendance status highlighted with colored pills; recent wallet transactions show 6 latest.
- Profile now shows both present and absent attendance records consistently.
- Home attendance section auto-refreshes every 1 minute.
- App bar title/logo scales better on small screens.

Notes:
- Android package ID changed to `com.insights_staff.app` for this release.
